testcase.classname: user should be able to sign up with new account only once
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user click on Register................................................passed When user write his first name..............................................passed And user write his last name................................................passed And user write his Email....................................................passed And user write his password.................................................passed And user confirm his password...............................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user sign up successfully and success message is displayed.............passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
User could reset his/her password successfully
Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed And user click on login.....................................................passed When user enter his Email...................................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user click on search field and write product name......................passed And click on search button..................................................passed Then user`s product will found..............................................passed

testcase.classname: User could switch between different currencies
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed And user click on login.....................................................passed When user enter his Email...................................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed Given user press on dropdown menu and choose Euro...........................passed Then user choose Euro successfully..........................................passed And user press on dropdown menu and choose US Dollar........................passed Then user choose US Dollar successfully.....................................passed
